articles.author: Victoria Edeme
articles.title: 2Baba didn’t come to see me in America, Pero refutes Annie Idibia’s claims - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Pero Adeniyi, baby mama to popular Nigerian singer, Innocent Idibia, popularly known as 2Baba has refuted claims made by the singer's wife, Annie Idibia,
articles.content:
Pero Adeniyi, baby mama to popular Nigerian singer, Innocent ‘2Baba’ Idibia, has refuted claims made by the singer’s wife, Annie, which led to a family drama last month.
In September, the Annie took… [+1824 chars]
